name: Jens Christian Claussen
content: Dr Jens Christian Claussen - School of Computer Science - University of Birmingham Dr Jens Christian Claussen School of Computer ScienceSenior Lecturer Contact details Emailj.c.claussen@bham.ac.uk View my research portal AddressUniversity of Birmingham Edgbaston Birmingham B15 2TT UK Jens Christian Claussen is Senior Lecturer at the School of Computer Science at the University of Birmingham. His research in nonlinear and stochastic dynamics of complex systems focuses on adaptive biological systems, especially evolution and the brain. Methods range from nonlinear dynamics and applied mathematics to statistical physics, control theory, delay equations, information theory, and neural and evolutionary computation. Evolutionary dynamics in finite populations and neural models related to consciousness and sleep have been major lines of research, complemented by complex systems approaches and data science methodology. He is also interested in socio-economic systems and network science, including unraveling what comprises complexity of networks and how to define complexity of a graph.
